results.description: Neymar scores the only goal as Paris St-Germain recover from a midweek defeat against Reims by beating Bordeaux in Ligue 1.
results.shortTitle: Neymar fires Paris St-Germain past Bordeaux
results.title: Bordeaux 0-1 Paris St-Germain: Neymar fires Ligue 1 leaders to victory

results.description: Nigeria coach Gernot Rohr is keen to try and persuade England-born striker Josh Maja to play for the Super Eagles.
results.title: Josh Maja: Nigeria chase England-born forward

results.description: Arsenal legend Ian Wright calls ex-Gunners captain Laurent Koscielny "disrespectful" for the nature of his unveiling at Bordeaux.
results.title: Laurent Koscielny: Arsenal legend Ian Wright calls defender 'disrespectful'

results.description: Arsenal sell defender Laurent Koscielny to Ligue 1 side Bordeaux for a fee of up to 5m euros (Â£4.6m).
results.title: Laurent Koscielny: Bordeaux sign defender from Arsenal

results.description: Cardiff City are look to complete a deal for Bordeaux's Senegal international Younousse Sankhare, who has also been linked with Swansea.
results.shortTitle: Cardiff City lead race to sign Sankhare
results.title: Younousse Sankhare: Cardiff lead race to sign Senegal international

results.description: Nigeria forward Samuel Kalu is taken to hospital on the eve of his side's first Africa Cup of Nations match suffering from "severe dehydration".
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Nigeria's Samuel Kalu collapses with dehydration in training

thumbnail.altText: Nigeria and Bordeaux forward Samuel Kalu

results.description: PSG striker Edinson Cavani is an injury doubt for Tuesday's tie at Manchester United after hurting himself in a league win over Bordeaux.
results.shortTitle: Cavani injured days before Man Utd game
results.title: PSG 1-0 Bordeaux: Edinson Cavani injured days before Manchester United game

results.description: Marseille win for the first time at home since November as they beat Bordeaux 1-0 in a Ligue 1 match played behind closed doors.
results.title: Marseille 1-0 Bordeaux: Stade Velodrome has no fans watching as hosts win

results.description: Sunderland's top goalscorer Josh Maja joins French Ligue 1 side Bordeaux for an undisclosed fee.
results.title: Josh Maja: Bordeaux sign Sunderland striker for undisclosed fee

results.description: Sunderland expect striker Josh Maja to leave before the January deadline for French Ligue 1 side Bordeaux.
results.shortTitle: Sunderland's Maja to make Bordeaux move
results.title: Josh Maja: Bordeaux to take Sunderland striker Maja to France

thumbnail.altText: Josh Maja has scored 16 goals for Sunderland this season

results.description: Three more Ligue 1 games this weekend are postponed amid fears of more violent "yellow vest" protests in France over rising living costs.
results.title: France protests: Three more Ligue 1 games postponed, including Monaco v Nice

results.description: Paris St-Germain drop points for the first time in Ligue 1 this season and lose Neymar to injury as they draw with Bordeaux.
results.shortTitle: PSG's 100% Ligue 1 run comes to end
results.title: Bordeaux 2-2 Paris St-Germain: Champions' 100% Ligue 1 run comes to end

results.description: Former Brighton boss Gus Poyet is suspended by Bordeaux after his criticism of the club about the sale of a key striker.
results.title: Gus Poyet: Bordeaux suspend ex-Brighton boss after criticism of player sale

results.description: Barcelona reach a deal to sign Bordeaux winger Malcom for Â£36.5m - a day after Roma said they were on the verge of signing him.
results.title: Malcom: Barcelona to sign Bordeaux's Brazilian winger for Â£36.5m

results.description: Roma agree a deal to sign Brazilian winger Malcom from Ligue 1 side Bordeaux for a reported Â£32m fee.
results.shortTitle: Roma agree deal for Bordeaux's Malcom
results.title: Malcom: Roma agree deal to sign Bordeaux winger

results.description: Tottenham and Arsenal target Malcom is staying at Bordeaux says new manager Gus Poyet, who revealed it was a condition of him taking over at the club.
results.shortTitle: Malcom to stay at Bordeaux - Poyet
results.title: Malcom: Tottenham and Arsenal target to stay at Bordeaux, says Gus Poyet

results.description: Neymar scores twice - including a penalty - as Paris St-Germain thrash Bordeaux in Ligue 1.
results.title: Paris St-Germain 6-2 Bordeaux

results.description: Mario Balotelli scores one goal and sets up another as Nice beat Bordeaux to move four points behind Ligue 1 leaders Monaco.
results.title: Nice 2-1 Bordeaux

thumbnail.altText: Mario Balotelli (right) celebrates after scoring from the penalty spot for Nice against Bordeaux

results.description: Monaco open up a five point lead over second-placed Nice at the top of Ligue 1 with victory over Bordeaux.
results.title: Monaco 2-1 Bordeaux
